sqlMap.select: SELECT A.PRT_AT_CODE, A.MNG_YEAR, A.MNG_NO, A.MNG_CNT, A.ENTRPSCD, A.ENTRPS_NM, to_char(A.FRST_REQST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REQST_DT, A.REQST_SE_CD, A.GR_AR, A.GR_FEE, A.NTIC_MTH, A.PRMISN_YN, to_char(A.PRMISN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRMISN_DT, A.QUAY_CD, A.QUAY_GROUP_CD, A.DEPTCD, (SELECT orgnzt_nm FROM comtnorgnztinfo where ORGNZT_ID = A.deptcd) DEPT_NM, to_char(A.REQST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQST_DT, A.PRMISN_USR, b.gis_assets_prt_at_code, b.gis_assets_cd, b.gis_assets_sub_cd, to_char(b.usage_pd_from, 'YYYY-MM-DD') usage_pd_from, to_char(b.usage_pd_to, 'YYYY-MM-DD') usage_pd_to, b.usage_ar, b.olnlp, b.fee FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRT_AT_CODE=B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR=B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO=B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT=B.MNG_CNT AND A.PRT_AT_CODE=#PRT_CD# AND A.MNG_YEAR=#MNG_YEAR# AND A.MNG_NO=#MNG_NO# AND A.MNG_CNT=#MNG_CNT# AND A.QUAY_GROUP_CD=#QUAY_CD#
